actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill establish the Missouri Breaks Scenic Recreation River in the State of Montana.

summary.text: Establishes the Missouri Breaks Scenic Recreation River in the State of Montana. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill establish the Missouri Breaks Scenic Recreation River in the State of Montana.
